name: Earl HOWARD, Petitioner v. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Louis S. Folino, Superintendent, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Howard v. Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Earl HOWARD, Petitioner v. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Louis S. Folino, Superintendent, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of October, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED. The Application to Dismiss is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
31 A.3d 284
Earl HOWARD, Petitioner v. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Louis S. Folino, Superintendent, Respondent.
No. 38 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 3, 2011.
